page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
{TONI DALE AGED 9 - ANSTEY LEICS.} On Wednesdays I get up and have my cereal. Then I walk to school at .35am and arrive at 8.45am. Then I go nto assembly. After that I go swimming in the school swimming pool. At half past ten I go to play for 15 minutes.
When we come in I do Maths or English or Topic work. At 12 o'clock we go for our dinner in the hall. I bring sandwiches to eat. After eating we play games like Tig and Hide and Seek outside in the playground. At 1.15 we go inside and do more work.
When 3.15 comes we go home. Then I play with my friends. I go to bed at 9.00pm. after having a drink of tea, coffee or milk.
